summary: This is an email from Ghislaine Maxwell to Doug Band, referencing plans for a dinner in New York involving two women described in sexualized terms and offering to connect Band with friends in Europe. The email suggests social coordination and potential introductions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Sends an email to Doug Band proposing a dinner in New York involving two women and offering European connections.

persons.name: Doug Band
persons.context: Receives an email from Ghislaine Maxwell discussing dinner plans and potential introductions in Europe.

persons.name: Philip
persons.context: Provided Doug Band's contact information to Ghislaine Maxwell via email.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell emails Doug Band to coordinate social plans and offer introductions.
Philip emailed Ghislaine Maxwell with Doug Band's contact information.
Philip had Doug Band's contact information and shared it with Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Proposed dinner in New York
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell proposes a dinner in New York involving a 'sluty Spanish girl' and a 'cool poised Swedish type'.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell emailed Doug Band to propose a dinner in New York involving two women described in sexualized terms.
Maxwell offered to connect Band with 'interesting and fun friends' in Europe for potential hookups.
Philip provided Doug Band's contact information to Ghislaine Maxwell via email.
